Name: Weaknesses Introduced During Implementation
Objective: This view (slice) lists weaknesses that can be introduced during implementation.

MappingNotes.Rationale: This entry is a View. Views are not weaknesses and therefore inappropriate to describe the root causes of vulnerabilities.
MappingNotes.Comments: Use this View or other Views to search and navigate for the appropriate weakness.

Content_History.ModificationComment: Updated the View_Filter to reflect new structure in CWE Schema v4.2
